entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts who is discussing the delivery of a parcel with Hermione.

entities.name: katie
entities.description: Katie is mentioned as someone who would have delivered the parcel to Harry if she had been in front of him.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts who is discussing the delivery of a parcel with Harry and Ron.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as someone who told Katie to take the parcel into the castle.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is a Hogwarts staff member who searches students entering and leaving the castle.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is mentioned as one of Malfoy's potential accomplices.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is mentioned as another of Malfoy's potential accomplices.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student at Hogwarts who is discussing the delivery of a parcel with Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: the fat lady
entities.description: The Fat Lady is a portrait that guards the entrance to the common room.

entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: Hogsmeade is a village near Hogwarts where students often go on weekends.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is the school that Harry, Hermione, and Ron attend.

relationships.description: Harry was behind Katie as they left the Three Broomsticks.
Malfoy told Katie to take the parcel into the castle.
Harry would have been searched by Filch if he had taken the parcel into the castle.
Malfoy is suspected of using Crabbe as an accomplice.
Harry and Hermione are discussing the delivery of a parcel.
Ron and Hermione exchange looks while discussing the delivery of a parcel with Harry.
